title: Are there any other kpop groups that have English raps in their songs like BLACKPINK does? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes!! Plenty!! Here are a few groups and artists that do English raps: DEAN2NE1, specifically CLWonder Girls (ICONIC ENGLISH RAPS!)JessiJay ParkTabloKARDBTS, specifically NamjoonGirls Generation (SNSD)BoAMiss ASuper Junior’s HenrySome groups were placed in this list as they have done English versions of their own songs, not just the rap. You may also find that groups change their raps to contain more English words when producing a Japanese version of their song.
